author: Anonymous Gear
title: template tags
question:
I'm confused with how to write template tags for abstract functions...
How do we know what goes in the template tag for these?

And if we use a abstract fold-function to write another new function, would we include "use-abstract-fn" or "try-catch" or "encapsulated" or any data definition names in the template tag?
student_answer: If you're just using the abstract fold-function to write another new function, you only use the use-abstract-fn template tag (regardless of what templates that abstract fold function uses). However, if your new function is more complex (that is, it has more in its function body then just a call to an abstract function), then you may require other template tags.
